name: sfpwowerscript-checkoutprojectfromartifact-task
friendlyName: Checkout the project from repository for the associated artifact
description: Use this utility task to checkout the mentioned commit from a sfpowerscripts build artifact/azure artifact for checking out project from associated artifact in a Release Pipelines, This task is part of sfpowerscripts
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Name of the package that is generated as part of the artifact
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the package that generated this artifact, Leave blank to support artifacts generated by older version of Create Tasks

inputs.name: aritfactDir
inputs.label: Path to the directory where artifacts are downloaded
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the artifact directory where the artifacts are downloaded, If not provided, the default values will be automatically used

inputs.name: versionControlProvider
inputs.label: Select the version control provider

options.hostedAgentGit: Git which is already authenticated at the agent level

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a version control provider from the dropdown

inputs.name: github_connection
inputs.label: GitHub Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your GitHub connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to read to the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: bitbucket_connection
inputs.label: BitBucket Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your BitBucket connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to read to the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: github_enterprise_connection
inputs.label: GitHub Enterprise Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your Git Hub Enterprise connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to read from the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username for the Version Control Provider

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: App Password/PAT for the Version Control Provider

inputs.name: skip_on_missing_artifact
inputs.label: Skip If no artifact is found
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not fail the task if attached artifact is missing,Use it to skip artifact installation by removing attached artifacts

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_checked_out_path
OutputVariables.description: The path to the directory where the source code is checked out
